vote.text: Amendment SA 4722 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 27 - 66. Record Vote Number: 118.

action.text: Amendment SA 4722 proposed by Senator Vitter to Amendment SA 4707. (consideration: CR S3854-3855, S3878-3879; text: CR S3854) To increase maximum coverage limits.
